name: To The Last
description:
In "To The Last" your dice are your biggest weapon. The Diceslinger is a fearsome cowboy who uses magical dice as ammunition. Reload your shotgun with dice in order to blast your demonic enemies right back to Hell, but be warned, if you run out of dice, it's Game Over.

This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 in just 48 hours.

WASD - Move

R - Reload

Left Click - Shoot

Your Dice are your ammo and your health! Press R to to load up dice into your shotgun. Note that you can't load up your last die. If you run out of dice, you die! Get it? It's a pun! "Die" as in what happens when you die, but also the singular of "dice"....

Do you get it?

Follow the objective in each area to advance, whether that be killing a certain number of demons or reaching a certain location. Keep your eyes and ears at the ready for instructions!

Search for the Golden Dice in each level to increase your dice pool! You'll need the extra firepower for the fight ahead.
